titleStmt.title: His Majesties answer to the petition of the Lords and Commons in Parliament assembled: presented to His Majestie at York, June 17. 1642.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Majestie: And by the Assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: Includes the text of the petition.
In this edition the first two words of title are in capital and small capital letters, except for the "j" in "Majesties" which is in lower case.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
